amendatorysection.catchline: Violation of Central Interstate Low-Level Radioactive Waste Compact; civil penalty.
amendatorysection.para: Any person who violates any provision of the Central Interstate Low-Level Radioactive Waste Compact shall be subject to a civil penalty of not more than ten thousand dollars per day of violation.

crossreference.para: Central Interstate Low-Level Radioactive Waste Compact, see section 71-3522.
